description: After a fun afternoon in Will Braun's uncle's prop shop, they guys have their costumes for the Halloween party all picked out, but in the course of modeling their different ensembles, the three of them have gotten pretty worked up. They're dressed to the nines but now all they can think about is getting naked again, so they grab their costumes and head back to the crib for a more private party. Jake Porter is in the holiday spirit early, ready to trick both of his guys, and Princeton Price and Will are more than happy to take full advantage of the treat. Together, the three of them will make sure this Halloween is a screaming good time. Enjoy!
series: NDB - 5023 - Princeton Price, Will Braun & Jake Porter
title: Halloween Hoe Down
